songs.title: That Bullshit
songs.lyrics:
Top dollar information
Comin' from the foundation
So check it out

[Verse 1]
It's gettin' harder in the streets to survive
It's snakes alive, so, yo, prepare to drive
In the outside lane and bounce on all traffic
Niggas in my mix only make me get graphic
Detailed description, funk overdose
Niggas from coast to coast get that ass ready for the roast
Fuck a barbecue
If you're askin' how many members is missin', it's probably two
I came inside the party to
Help you recognize, how every second flies
So the way I'mma sum it up: It's time to organize
But before we do that part, some of us got to get
Our minds together and get off the bullshit

[Hook repeated]
That Bullshit

[Large Professor]
Yeah, it's crazy real
It's when real is real
Check it out

[Verse 2]
I watch the white, watch the red and blue fight all night
On the American flag, another gang banger bag
We're losin' at a rate that's tragic
Peace to my man Ryan-O, around the way we called him Magic
A brother who just wanted to chill and play ball
Light skin, was ye tall, he used to say "Paul
You comin' out with somethin'?"
I used to say "No Doubt", he wasn't into dumbin' out or frontin'
And to my other blank man who used to call me "Yankee"
I got enough problems with the people that don't thank me
When I hold the door, we in the same hall on the same side
That's why sometimes I gotta slide
'Cause my own be flippin'
Step up in my path and get hit by a mental ass-whippin'
Get off that bullshit

[Hook repeated]
That Bullshit

[Verse 3]
When opportunity knocks, you gotta answer nowadays
To make power plays, we must change our ways
And use all the resources that life has to offer
Strong will survive, weak will get softer
So get offa the bullshit, is the name of the poem
To the metronome, take it one time to the dome
As the right type of hype kid, you know I'm legit
With my new funk hit, get off the bullshit

[Hook repeated]
That Bullshit

[Large Professor]
Yeah, it's crazy real
It's when real is real
Get off that bullshit, word up
Get off that bullshit, nahmsayin'?
Get off that bullshit, word up
That Bullshit
